title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

2 points are earned the antiderivative

1 point is earned for the answer

Area= ∫ 0 1/2 (g(x)−f(x))dx         = ∫ 0 1/2 (sin(πx) −8 x 3 )dx         = [ − 1 π cos(πx)−2 x 4 ] x=0 x=1/2         =− 1 8 + 1 π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8C76@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for limits and constant

2 points are earned for integrand

π ∫ 0 1/2 ( (1−f(x)) 2 − (1−g(x)) 2 ) dx =π ∫ 0 1/2 ( (1−8 x 3 ) 2 − (1−sin(πx)) 2 ) dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6D52@
